Package civitas.celestis.math

Enum Class Sign

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Sign>
civitas.celestis.math.Sign
All Implemented Interfaces:
Packable8, Serializable, Comparable<Sign>, Constable
public enum Sign extends Enum<Sign> implements Packable8
The sign of a number.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    NaN
    When the value is either Double.NaN or Float.NaN.
    NEGATIVE
    When the value is below zero.
    NEGATIVE_INFINITY
    When the value is either Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY ot Float.POSITIVE_INFINITY.
    POSITIVE
    When the value is above zero.
    POSITIVE_INFINITY
    When the value is either Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY or Float.POSITIVE_INFINITY.
    ZERO
    When the value is zero.

    • unpack8

      @Nonnull public static Sign unpack8(byte sign8)

      When the data is invalid, this will fallback to NaN instead of throwing an exception.

      Parameters:
      sign8 - The packed 8-bit representation of this sign
      Returns:
      The unpacked sign

    • pack8

      public byte pack8()
      Packs the data regarding the current state of this object into 8 bits, in the format of a short.

      This simply casts the constant ordinal (obtainable by Enum.ordinal()) to a byte.

      Specified by:
      pack8 in interface Packable8
      Returns:
      The packed bits
